src:
菊池桃子さん、６０歳の経産省局長と再婚…今年入ってから交際

04 Nov 2019, 14:39



菊池桃子さん

　女優の菊池桃子さん（５１）が４日、自身のブログで、今年に入ってから交際をしていた男性と再婚したと発表した。複数の関係者によると、相手は経済産業省の新原浩朗（ひろあき）経済産業政策局長（６０）。同日付で婚姻届を出したという。
　菊池さんはブログで「いくつになっても人間的な成長を目指す前向きで明るい伴侶と共に、私自身、仕事も精進を重ね、もうひと回り大きくなる姿を皆様に見ていただけるようがんばってまいります」とつづった。
　菊池さんは２０１５年に始動した「１億総活躍社会」の実現に向けて議論する政府の「国民会議」の民間議員を務めた。
text:
Ms. Momoko Kikuchi remarried with the 60-year-old Director of METI ...

04 Nov 2019, 14:39



Momoko Kikuchi

Actress Momoko Kikuchi (51) announced on her blog on the 4th that she remarried a man who had been dating this year. According to several officials, the other party is Hiroaki Niihara, Director of Economy, Trade and Industry Policy Bureau, Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (60). It was reported that the marriage was filed on the same date.
Mr. Kikuchi said on his blog: “I will do my best so that I can continue to work with my positive and bright mate who is aiming for personal growth, and I will continue to work harder so that everyone can see it getting bigger.” It was.
Mr. Kikuchi served as a private member of the government's “National Conference” to discuss the realization of a “100 million total active society” launched in 2015.
